name: LionandMouseGame-CanyouACT
0:
”Alexa, open let us act”
”start the game”
”help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: let us act
des:
In this Game, Alexa will narrate you the wonderful famous lion and mouse story. 
In the middle of the story, Alexa will act like a lion and consider your kids to be a mouse. 

Kids have to follow Alexa's voice and act the same as it is asked to do so. The Alexa conversation, designed to be more interactive for your kids to increase their listening skills. 

Enable this Alexa skill and enjoy listening to the story while your kid acting on it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
